dt2.11:1.2: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.11:1.3: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:1.4: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:1.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:2.2: purisindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.11:2.5: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:3.4: domanassindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…
dt2.11:3.5: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:3.8: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:4.1: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.11:4.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:4.5: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:5.14: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:5.15: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:5.17: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:6.1: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.11:6.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:7.3: domanassena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.11:7.4: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:7.7: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.11:8.14: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.15: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.17: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.18: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.27: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.28: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.11:8.29: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.11:8.30: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.11:8.31: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.11:8.33: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
